key_concept: Place text on the screen using a coordinate plane, use arguments to change the appearance of text.

rubric.Extensive Evidence: Two pieces of text appear on the screen in reasonable places, and the text pieces are different sizes.
rubric.Convincing Evidence: The text block is used, and it appears on the screen in a reasonable place.
rubric.Limited Evidence: The text block is used, but the text does not appear completely on the screen.
rubric.No Evidence: No text blocks are used, or it contains so many errors that the program cannot run.
